private newTimeEff:ECSC.EffectBase;
private newEffGroup:eui.Group;
private ShowNewTween(show:boolean)
{
	if(this.newTimeEff != null)
	{
		RenderUtils.DestroyEffect2(SceneTypeConst.Home, this.newTimeEff);
		this.newTimeEff = null;
	};
	if(show == true)
	{
		this.newTimeEff = RenderUtils.CreateEffect(SceneTypeConst.Home, 2505, 0, 0);
		this.newEffGroup.addChild(this.newTimeEff);
	}
}
